info.name: Soundcloud Pitch Black
info.description: Soundcloud in dark :) For the nice font in the screenshot download & install this font: Champagne & Limousines - For even more black & white experience you can additionally install Soundcloud Grayscale --- Check out my other "Dark" styles: ₪ Google ₪ Discogs ₪ TabletPCReview & NotebookReview Forum ₪ Computerbase ₪ Global dark style ₪ and more...
info.additionalInfo:
2020-08-03: Fixed header menus and some other stuff
2019-09-16: Small fixes on the upload page
2018-04-08: Checkboxes fixed, Soundcloud Stream Manager support
2018-01-05: Small fixes...
2017-06-21: Style updates for the new queue feature!

data.title: I like this style and it updates fairly regularly. But right now SoundCloud changed something.
Wonderful. Any thoughts on widget/embeds theming
This is the only theme I've tried that works
